_nghost-ng-c4091383748 ngh="20"><!----></app-bottom-sticky-dialog></app-root>

<!-- Lazy load social embeds only when needed -->
<script>
  (function() {
    var embedsLoaded = { twitter: false, instagram: false };

    function loadTwitterEmbed() {
      if (embedsLoaded.twitter) return;
      embedsLoaded.twitter = true;
      var s = document.createElement('script');
      s.src = 'https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js';
      s.async = true;
      s.charset = 'utf-8';
      document.body.appendChild(s);
    }

    function loadInstagramEmbed() {
      if (embedsLoaded.instagram) return;
      embedsLoaded.instagram = true;
      var s = document.createElement('script');
      s.src = 'https://platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js';
      s.async = true;
      document.body.appendChild(s);
    }

    // Загружаем скрипты только когда embed появляется в viewport
    if ('IntersectionObserver' in window) {
      var observer = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
        entries.forEach(function(entry) {
          if (entry.isIntersecting) {
            var target = entry.target;
            if (target.classList.contains('twitter-tweet') || target.tagName === 'BLOCKQUOTE' && target.classList.contains('twitter-tweet')) {
              loadTwitterEmbed();
            }
            if (target.classList.contains('instagram-media') || target.tagName === 'BLOCKQUOTE' && target.classList.contains('instagram-media')) {
              loadInstagramEmbed();
            }
          }
        });
      }, { rootMargin: '200px' });

      // Наблюдаем за новыми embeds через MutationObserver
      var mutationObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
        mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
          mutation.addedNodes.forEach(function(node) {
            try {
              if (node.nodeType === 1) {
                var twitterEmbeds = node.querySelectorAll ? node.querySelectorAll('.twitter-tweet, blockquote.twitter-tweet') : [];
                var instagramEmbeds = node.querySelectorAll ? node.querySelectorAll('.instagram-media, blockquote.instagram-media') : [];
                twitterEmbeds.forEach(function(el) { observer.observe(el); });
                instagramEmbeds.forEach(function(el) { observer.observe(el); });
                if (node.classList && (node.classList.contains('twitter-tweet') || node.classList.contains('instagram-media'))) {
                  observer.observe(node);
                }
              }
            } catch (e) {}
          });
        });
      });
      mutationObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });
    } else {
      // Fallback: загружаем через 3 секунды
      setTimeout(function() {
        loadTwitterEmbed();
        loadInstagramEmbed();
      }, 3000);
    }
  })();
</script>

<!-- Google Tag Manager (deferred to end of body for better FCP/LCP) -->
<script>
  function ga() {
    // stub for deprecated universal google analytics calls
  }

  (function(w, d, s, l, i) {
    w[l] = w[l] || [];

    function gtag() {
      window.dataLayer.push(arguments);
    }

    gtag('consent', 'default', {
      ad_storage: 'denied',
      ad_user_data: 'denied',
      ad_personalization: 'denied',
      analytics_storage: 'granted',
      functionality_storage: 'granted',
      personalization_storage: 'granted',
      security_storage: 'granted',
      wait_for_update: 500
    });

    w[l].push({
      'gtm.start':
        new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js'
    });
    var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
      j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
    j.async = true;
    j.src =
      'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
    f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
  })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-5KK3NSH');
</script>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
